name: Minervamon
description: Minervamon is a Shaman Digimon. One of the " Olympos XII ", it has the appearance of a maiden warrior wearing snake skin.  Though it has an extremely short physique, it possesses superhuman strength it uses to freely wield a greatsword, " Olympia ", as large as its own body. It possesses a cheerful personality due to its childlike innocence, but when its emotions become violently unstable, it gets into a bad mood which causes selfish and willful (problematic) behavior that no one can help it cope with.
